name: Rab'run
description:
Pitch :

After being remote from their kingdom, rabbits are trying to escape from the parallel world in which they are. The should use their differents skills to spend obstacles which will rise up in front of them


Gameplay :

You have to help rabbit from the start, to the end of the game

You can give jobs to your rabbits. With jobs, rabbits can do some actions, to helping you to solve the differents puzzles

Press the Death Button when you complete the level to end it

Increase your rabbits' stats in the army menu to make the levels easier

Control your rabbits' speed to do the rights choices

Complete the 18 Levels to finish the game

Controls : 

Left click : Select object and execute actions

Right click / Wheel click : Drag your view in the level

Space : Show the speed wheel

Up arrow / W / Z : Moving up your view

Right arrow / D : Moving right your view

Down arrow / S : Moving down your view

Left arrow / A / Q : Moving left your view

Scrolling up : Zoom

Scrolling up : Zoom out

Why this game ?

We are 3 students at the IIM, in Paris, la Défense. We have to do something about video games every month, so we decided to create this game. Hovewer, we decided to challenge us, because Paul LEDUC is Game Designer ans Sébastien GUAROBER is Programmer. We decided to turn the tables for creating this game

Credits :

Game Designer : Paul Leduc

Level Designer : Paul Leduc

Programmer : Paul Leduc

Graphist : Soulaymane Guigon

(all of the assets aren't finish for the moment, waiting for a next update ;) )

UI Graphist : Sébastien Guarober

Menu Graphist : Paul Leduc

Sound Designer : Paul Leduc

Theme : Owl City - Fireflies (8 bits)

Inspiration : The Lemmings
